title: Navigation and location search
content:
# Google Maps App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Explore** (discover area), **You** (saved places/trips), and **Contribute** (reviews/photos).
- **Map Layers**: Tap the **Square/Diamond icon** (top right) to switch between Default, Satellite, or Terrain views and toggle details like Traffic or Transit.
- **Current Location**: Tap the **Target icon** (floating button) to re-center the map on your current position.

## Search
- **Search Bar**: Type addresses or place names in the top bar ("Search here"). Tap the **Mic icon** for voice search.
- **Quick Categories**: Use the chips below the search bar to find nearby **Restaurants**, **Petrol**, **Hotels**, or **Coffee**.
- **Search Results**: Viewing a list of results shows distance (e.g., "450 m") and directional arrows for quick orientation.

## Common Actions
- **Get Directions**: Tap the blue **Directions** button on a place's card to plan a route. Select your mode of transport: **Car**, **Two-wheeler**, **Transit**, or **Walking**.
- **Start Navigation**: Once a route is selected, tap the blue **Start** button (arrow icon) to begin turn-by-turn voice navigation.
- **Call/Contact**: Use the **Call** button on a business listing to dial them directly.

## Tips
- **Add Stops**: While navigating or planning, tap **Add stops** (or the search icon) to include a detour like a gas station or restaurant along your route.
- **Local Vibe**: Swipe up on the "Explore" tab to see a **"Local vibe"** section with photos and videos of popular spots in the area.
- **Save Fuel**: The app often highlights the most fuel-efficient route with a small **leaf icon** (e.g., "Saves 18% fuel").
